113.content:
Ace McKight Johnsons

Sergeant Major / Zeon earth forces ( http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/Principalit... for rank undestanding)

Born on earth Ace grew up seeing the greed and vileany of the earth feartion gover ment 1st hand living in baltamor maryland. When the Zeon forces started sacuring the area he started attack EFGF troops on hiss oun even stealing a tank and painting it like the zeon flag. His actions behind the lies aided in the capture of baltamore haber as well as the lose of saplies need by the EFGF in the area. Doring the main asalt on the Baltimore Navle yards his gartila group caned Bloody Creascent Moon for its simbyle of a red creascent moon attacked independly at the same time this lead him to find and capture a early V-pragect MS the RX-76 "Gundam-tank" It was heavy mobile suit that catapiler tracks instedof lages had a single high powered beam cannon on its right showlder, heavy armor, a Mulitple Launch Warhead Missle Launcher on its left. It had no sheald but in stead featured a wrist munted hydralic ram rod for close corters combat and a captured Zaku mashine gun. 1131.content:
"Damn! When did the feddy's get there hand on Zaku's!" shouted ace as his tank turned down a ally. Ace sat in the gun at 5'4" and 25 years old people still mistake him for a kid. He wears black combat boots, black and white cameo cargo pants a red shirt with the Zeon flag on the front of it, over that he wore a black jeans jacket with a dragon on the back of it. He had bleached his hair white and grew it out down to the small of his back to stand out, his eyes where gray as ash.

"Well boss the had to use there brains some time." Said a young girl in the driver seat. She had Pink hair in pig tails and brown eyes she was 5'6" and 18 years old had modest Bcup breasts and a cute smile. She wore a red School girl cosplay outfit with matching beret. Her name was was Marymay Zoa.

"Yeah but now we're in real truble here! That last shot may not have been a direct hit but it did knock out the tureats rowtater! We can trune the guns!" Said a painced Blond woman with mid langth curly hear and blue eyes. She hade a valumpchus body with nice Ccup breasts. She had a black coler with a bell on her neck and wore body tight black leather pants and matching tube top. She was 6'1" and 24 years old her name Kathline (kitten) Tomson.

"Up ahead thers a open hang well hide in thear and see if we can do repairs." ordered Ace

"Right Boss!" shoted Marymay as she floored it thrugh the door scraping the pant and runing down 2 Feddy soldures that wher trighing to close it.

"Hay Bloody Marymay I think you hit some thing." joked Kitten

"Ok girl you 2 fix the tank I'll check for others." said Ace as he climed out of the tank.

"Right Boss." said both girls.

As he looked around he saw the large mashine that looked like a cross between a tank and a Mobile Suit. He climed in a open hatch and started hiting switches and it truned right on. Then he heard the bace controler over the comactions chanle on the mashine. "All units garela tanks are not a consen fousc on the Zeon Mobile Suits." said a woman on a small moniter in the upper right hand conner.

"Zaku team on the way just make sure tho guner dont hit us by mistake. Why the hell dit the garrelas and Spacebumes attack on the same night." Complained a Feddy pilot

"Unclear but we can not let them get to the RX-76 no matter what." said the feddy controler.

Ace fliped to his teams channle "Hay girls i found a feddy tankmobie suit thing it looks like its ready to go im going to tak it for a spin go to the randavue point when repairs are done." said ace befor puting the raido on open chanle.He could hear the battle as it raged around him.

He shut the hatch and braght the weapons online. "OK! This is the Dragon of the Bloody Creascent Moon! Tonight the bay will run read with feddy blood!" Shouted Ace on a opean channle befor fireing the right shulder cannon. Blowing through the hanger door and 3 near biuldings causeing them to colapse.

In the Baces controle biulding they saw the flash of the beam cannon. "What was that!" shouted the bace commander The contrler franticly tryed to find out. She truned pail and looked to the comander "Sir The troops protecting the Gundam tank is attacking our oun troops and is saporting the zeon by sinking the ships in the harber with its beam cannon." she said shaking.

Zeon attack comander "What theres a new feady weapon fireing on its oun side!" *must be that garrela group i heard about* "MY team we are moving to saport it." she ordered.

The Gundam tank fired a missle it split in to 12 smaller misles and blow away sevral air and ground targets at once. then a Zeon Zaku set a hand on its shulder. "Pilot you the one that made the bost early?" asked a female voice.

Ace turned the main camra to her mashine "Yes I am there on the ropes here I'm movige to take out the feddys Zaku's now then ill hit the bcae's comand center."

The gundam tank charged for ward running down eanmy units in it's path. It smashed trough a bilding and swung the left arm inpacting the feddy zaku by saprise, then the hidralic spike she for ward punching a whole thrugh the center of the enamy MS. It then fell over and exsploed. The gundam tank turned to its leaft and fired its Zaku mashinegun at the 2nd feddy Zaku thats pilot had frozen in shock. the bulliets drilled home cuseing the enamy to pop and smoke then slump forward.

"Oh shit what the hell is this that thing was one of our mashines why is it attacking us!" shuted the 3rd feddy pilot as he truned to run.

Ace targeted the missle launcher on the fleeing suit. "No surviers!" the screen flashed and beep the wards 'full lock' flashed on scren and he fired. the Missle zoomed by the eanmy mashine and in to the sky then it split in to 12 missles and arced back down on the mashine and it vanished in a ball of fire.

In the comand center they where eveacuating, abanding the bace to the zeon forces. The controler was the last ot as she had coradnated the evacuration she was on her way to her madia trasport to exscape. As she exsited she saw the exscaping tras ports being shot down as the wher taking of or still on the ground by the gundam tank. then it truned and ajusted its cannon to target the bace contrle center. She started running for a trasport. The gundam tank fired its can destroying the belding then it fired a burst of its Zaku mashine gun at the madias still yet to launch destroing them.

"Oh god....... We sarendered the bace..... We sarendered!" She cryed and feel to her knee's. The gundam tank started to aproch her. She started to run the left hand opened and reached out grabing her and lifting her up. The hand started to tighten around her. *OH NO! NOT LIKE THIS!* she thought.

As she blacked ot the comand zaku ran over and grabed the gundam tanks arm. "Stop She might have use full intel." said the Zeon woman.

The gundam tanks hand eased up and stated to drive off. "Im seanding you my rally point form my troops meat me there." said Ace.

Kitten drag the woman in to the tank and tied her up bondige still befor thoughly serching her.

1453.title: Make your own hero and gundam (male or female p...

choices: Lets skip the attack of Blaze's town and make him a pilot
14531.content: On a normal day in a peaceful world just 13 years after the events of Char's counterattack where both Char and Amuro vanished. No one knows if Amuro is dead or alive but as for Char he returned to Earth and had a family which lead to him having a son who he named Blaze "Amuro" after his rival Aznable. 13 years has past since his son was born and he grew into a fine young man but on that tragic day a attack happen by the soldiers of Zeon that lived after the events that take place 13 years again. During the 13 years of char living on earth he was rebuilding his Zaku which is red and fast for he was once called "The Red Comet". Meanwhile at Colony 195 a single man is making a new gundam to prevent war and bring peace to the earth and the colonies. It is called Fenrir it is like the older brother of Wing Zero but unlike Wing Zero it is pure black armor and has two duel sabers no long range weapons for it is meant for close range combat. Now the beam sabers are as long as a lance and it is reinforce with 6 layers of special beam rifle resisttent armor which makes it even heavier then sandrock but it is still just as fast as Wing Zero. However it doesn't have the ZERO system, months have past and Fenrir is finally finished however at the same time the peacekeeper Heero Yuy has been killed by a soldier of OZ and that soldier is also after the new mobile suit but the only person working on it has sent the monile suit to earth and it lands on a beach where it has stayed for 13 years. Now that the prelude is over let the true story begin. It is time to make a Legend.
14531.title: Prelude and birth of Fenrir

14533.content: Lets make a cybrog gundam. But will it be male or female?
14533.title: make your own cybernetic gundam (male or female?)

info.brief_description: You have just been drafted to pilot a gundam. What are you going to do?
info.description:
Here is a brief plot to the story i have in mind. A young boy or girl about the age of 13 has witness a Attack by soldiers leftover from the Zeon era. After that that boy or girl has become a anti hero after finding the Fenrir gundam a gundam that is more advance then even the Wing Zero mobile suit but due to witnessing the attack has left him or her Traumatize and talks to the gundam Fenrir like it is a person. Now let the story begin may update this part later.
Rules:1 must have 1 paragraph per chapter unless it is a option but even then add some details for those option chapters
2:the main hero must never die
3:anyone else can die
4:fenrir can be upgraded and it also has a A.I but prefers to be pilot
